mapper.sql: select id, accounting_period, actuarial_code, business_code, product_name, term_type, design_type, short_term_flag, valid_policy_count, accumulated_premium, account_value, dividend_provision, best_estimate, risk_margin, residual_margin, unmodeled_reserve, waiver_reserve, persistence_bonus_reserve, long_term_unearned, short_term_unearned, unearned_premium_reserve, outstanding_claim_reserve, total_accounting_reserve, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_del from t_base_accounting_reserve_detail
mapper.select: where actuarial_code = #{actuarialCode} and accounting_period = #{accountingPeriod} and is_del = 0
mapper.insert:
insert into t_base_accounting_reserve_detail
accounting_period, actuarial_code, business_code, product_name, term_type, design_type, short_term_flag, valid_policy_count, accumulated_premium, account_value, dividend_provision, best_estimate, risk_margin, residual_margin, unmodeled_reserve, waiver_reserve, persistence_bonus_reserve, long_term_unearned, short_term_unearned, unearned_premium_reserve, outstanding_claim_reserve, total_accounting_reserve, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_del
#{accountingPeriod}, #{actuarialCode}, #{businessCode}, #{productName}, #{termType}, #{designType}, #{shortTermFlag}, #{validPolicyCount}, #{accumulatedPremium}, #{accountValue}, #{dividendProvision}, #{bestEstimate}, #{riskMargin}, #{residualMargin}, #{unmodeledReserve}, #{waiverReserve}, #{persistenceBonusReserve}, #{longTermUnearned}, #{shortTermUnearned}, #{unearnedPremiumReserve}, #{outstandingClaimReserve}, #{totalAccountingReserve}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, 0
mapper.update: update t_base_accounting_reserve_detail set is_del = 1 where id = #{id}

insert into t_base_accounting_reserve_detail ( accounting_period, actuarial_code, business_code, product_name, term_type, design_type, short_term_flag, valid_policy_count, accumulated_premium, account_value, dividend_provision, best_estimate, risk_margin, residual_margin, unmodeled_reserve, waiver_reserve, persistence_bonus_reserve, long_term_unearned, short_term_unearned, unearned_premium_reserve, outstanding_claim_reserve, total_accounting_reserve, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_del ) values
( #{item.accountingPeriod}, #{item.actuarialCode}, #{item.businessCode}, #{item.productName}, #{item.termType}, #{item.designType}, #{item.shortTermFlag}, #{item.validPolicyCount}, #{item.accumulatedPremium}, #{item.accountValue}, #{item.dividendProvision}, #{item.bestEstimate}, #{item.riskMargin}, #{item.residualMargin}, #{item.unmodeledReserve}, #{item.waiverReserve}, #{item.persistenceBonusReserve}, #{item.longTermUnearned}, #{item.shortTermUnearned}, #{item.unearnedPremiumReserve}, #{item.outstandingClaimReserve}, #{item.totalAccountingReserve}, #{item.remark}, #{item.createBy}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateBy}, #{item.updateTime}, 0 )
